Class NetworkManagementSocketTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • SocketTagger
      • com.android.server.NetworkManagementSocketTagger

  • public final class NetworkManagementSocketTagger
extends SocketTagger
    Assigns tags to sockets for traffic stats.
